title: Rally Chassis
description: A robust 1/10 scale rally car chassis provides four wheel drive, brushed DC motor, and ESC suitable for most speeds (0-30 mph).

title: Fully Integrated
description: All hardware and software components have been carefully integrated and extensively tested so you can focus on what matters.

title: Simulation
description: Our ROS-based simulator let's you prototype your system without needing to turn on the robot, saving you valuable time when you do.

title: LiDAR
description: Integration with the YDLiDAR X4 provides a 360 degree FOV at 10hz, all in a radically economic package.

title: IMU
description: Learn the principles of sensor fusion or test your latest SLAM algorithm using the Razor 9dof IMU or any other of your choice.

title: RGBD Camera
description: MuSHR uses the Intel Realsense line of RGBD cameras to provide point clouds for tasks such as obstacle avoidance or object tracking.
